quote: You turned your head to the side. Faced me. Your eyes never left mine, I read them with ease. You said nothing to them, yet everything to me. I nodded.But only when no one was watching.
quote_letters: YOU TURNED YOUR HEAD TO THE SIDE FACED ME YOUR EYES NEVER LEFT MINE I READ THEM WITH EASE YOU SAID NOTHING TO THEM YET EVERYTHING TO ME I NODDEDBUT ONLY WHEN NO ONE WAS WATCHING
source: Ali Land, Good Me, Bad Me
